programme.title: Men's 89kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Weightlifting Men's 89kg took place at the South Paris Arena 6 on 09/08/24. Karlos May Nasar (BUL) won the Gold medal, Yeison Lopez (COL) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Antonino Pizzolato (ITA).

programme.title: Women's 49kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Women's 49kg competition which took place at the South Paris Arena 6 on 07/08/24. Hou Zhihui (CHN) won Gold, Mihaela Valentina Cambei (ROU) won Silver and Surodchana Khambao (THA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Olympic Outposts - Episode 4: A global journey to discover sports passions in the most unlikely places.
programme.desc: From gruelling Ultra marathon in Mexico to Samoa’s weightlifting power-house or surfing on the freezing waters in Canada our hosts discover passion for sports in countries you would never expect.

programme.title: How Jordan’s Olympic medal turned Ahmad Abughaush into an icon
programme.desc: When Ahmad Abughaush won Jordan’s first-ever Olympic gold medal in 2016, he instantly became an icon for his fellow countrymen.

programme.title: The Vault: Julien Alfred, the shoes of Cuba’s wrestling legend, Mexico 1968’s iconic design
programme.desc: Jeannette and Rob discovers Julien Alfred’s kit in The Vault, recently collected at Paris Olympics. The Saint Lucian sprint sensation has overcome many personal challenges to win the first ever gold medal for the Caribbean Island in the 100m final. Rob discovers the magic of a seemingly ordinary dollar bill, in the equestrian community while we learn about the iconic design of Mexico 1968.

programme.title: The Vault: Rebeca Andrade, rare items from the cancelled Tokyo 1940 Games, Olympic torches & swimwear throughout the years
programme.desc: Rebeca Andrade and Simon Biles leotards back-to-back in The Vault take us to the amazing world of gymnastics at the Olympics. We meet the Brazilian queen of gymnastics in training in San Paolo who shared her emotion in dethroning the American legend in the Floor event at Paris 2024 in her sparkling yellow kit. Rob explores a small but very rare collection of objects from the cancelled 1940 Tokyo Games while Jeannette finds herself in the Olympic torch room.

programme.title: The Santiago Lange story (extended version)
programme.desc: After five Olympic Games, the Argentine sailor still hadn’t found gold. And then came cancer. Could he win in Rio?

programme.title: Men's +102kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's +102kg competition which took place at the South Paris Arena 6 on 10/08/24. Lasha Talakhadze (GEO) won Gold, Varazdat Lalayan (ARM) won Silver and Gor Minasyan (BRN) won Bronze.

programme.title: Mixed Relay Final | Triathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Relay Triathlon Final took place at Pont Alexandre III on August 5, 2024 in Paris, France. Germany claimed Gold, United States Silver, and Great Britain completed the podium.

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 6
programme.desc: A new Trinidad star throws himself into the record books, Killy leaves his mark, oldest Olympians, and Kenyan Steeplechase dominance.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.

programme.title: Can Jackie Silva get this Brazilian volleyball team to defeat their rival?
programme.desc: Brazilian Olympic gold medalist Jackie Silva lends her expertise to a Rio indoor volleyball team as they try to win their first event ever.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: ESP-AUS - Women's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Spain won Gold with a final score ESP 11:9 AUS.

programme.title: Exiles Waterpolo Club
programme.desc: Team Hungary Olympic hero Tamas Molnar travels to the island nation of Malta to turn around the fortunes of a struggling waterpolo team.

programme.title: Footsteps: Family Stories from the Balkans
programme.desc: A new Original series that profiles Olympic families from Croatia, Serbia, Montenegro, Slovenia, and Bosnia and Herzegovina and how the newest generation is carrying on their family’s legacy.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 15 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 15 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, Paris, on 10/08/24. Watch Hamish Kerr (NZL) win Gold at the Men's High Jump Final, and Emmanuel Wanyonyi (KEN) claim victory at the Men's 800m Final. At the Women's Javelin Throw Final, Kitaguchi Haruka (JPN) took the Gold medal, while Masai Russell (USA) also won Gold at the Women's 100m Hurdles Final. Norway's Jakob Ingebrigtsen succeeded at claim the top spot at the podium for the Men's 5000m, and and Faith Kipyegon (KEN) also achieved Gold at the Women's 1500m Final. Team USA claimed Gold at both, Men's 4 x 400m Relay Final and Women's 4 x 400m Relay Final.

programme.title: Tuskers Volleyball Club
programme.desc: Team USA Olympic hero Danielle Scott-Arruda travels to London, England to try to turn around the fortunes of a struggling volleyball team.

programme.title: Individual All-Around Final | Rhythmic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Individual All-Around Final which took place at La Chapelle Arena, Paris at 09/08/2024.
Darja Varfolomeev (GER) won Gold, Boryana Kaleyn (BUL) won Silver and Sofia Raffaeli (ITA) won Bronze.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 14 | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Women's Canoe and Kayak Doubles 500m Semi-Finals and Finals, the Men's Kayak Double 500m Semi-Finals and Finals and the Men's Canoe Single 1000m Semi-Finals and Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 09/08/24.
The Women's Canoe Double 500m Final was won by Xu /Sun (CHN) with Gold, Luzan/Rybachok (UKR) took silver and Mackenzie/Vincent (CAN) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Carrington/Hoskin (NZL) with Gold, Csipes/Gazso (HUN) with Silver and a tie in Bronze for Paulina Paszek/Julie Marie Hake (GER) and Pupp/Fojt (HUN).
The Men's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Schopf/Lemke (GER) with Gold, Bence Nadas/Totka (HUN) with Silver and Van Der Westhuyzen/Green (AUS) with Bronze.
The Men's Canoe Single 1000m Final was won by Martin Fuksa (CZE) with Gold, Isaquias Queiroz (BRA) with Silver and Serghei Tarnovschi (MDA) with Bronze.

programme.title: 10m Air Rifle Mixed Team Finals | Shooting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 27/07/2024 at the Chateauroux Shooting Range, Paris. CHN claimed the Gold, KOR the Silver and KAZ completed the podium.

programme.title: India’s Top Pistol Shooter Manu Bakher | Jee Jan Se
programme.desc: Throughout her childhood and teenage years, Manu Bakher switched sports half a dozen times. When she started practicing air pistol shooting, she knew this was the one for her. This is her amazing story.

programme.title: Shooting vs Cricket with Manu Bhaker and Smriti Mandhana | Sports Swap India
programme.desc: What happens in the battle of precision between cricket and shooting? The challenge is on, as Smriti Mandhana and Manu Bhaker swap the pistols and bats.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Mallo-Breton (FRA) and Kong (HKG) - Women's Épée Individual Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Épée Individual Gold Medal Bout between Auriane Mallo-Breton (FRA) and Man Wai Vivian Kong (HKG) took place on 27/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Mallo-Breton took the Silver,and Kong took the Gold.

programme.title: Matteo Zurloni Italy’s world champion climbs to the top | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Dive into the remarkable journey of Matteo Zurloni, from small town dreamer to Olympic contender. He won the speed event at the 2023 IFSC Climbing World Championships and earning a shot at Olympic glory. Follow his ascent from humble beginnings to the dizzying heights of international competition, where every climb is a test of skill, courage, and the relentless pursuit of excellence.

programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match FRA - FIJ | Rugby Sevens | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match between France and Fiji took place on 27/07/2024, at the Stade de France. France took the Gold with a Final Score FRA 28:7 FIJ.

programme.title: Jerry Tuwai: bringing hope from the slum to the nation
programme.desc: Jerry Tuwai grew up in a poor shanty in Fiji playing rugby with plastic bottles. He went on to win the first Olympic medal for his country.

programme.title: Men's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Lukas Maertens (GER) claimed Gold with a time of 3:41.78, Elijah Winnington (AUS) took Silver and Kim Woomin (KOR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Ariarne Titmus (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 3:57.49. Summer McIntosh (CAN) took Silver and Katie Ledecky (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's's 4x100m Freestyle relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with a time of 3:28.92, The United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 4x100m Freestyle Relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. The United States of America claimed Gold with a time of 3:09.28, Australia took Silver and Italy completed the podium.

programme.title: Meet the young US swimmer who broke Michael Phelps’ record
programme.desc: Carson Foster is one the world’s fastest young swimmers. At the age of 10, he broke one of his idols records: Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Olympic State of Mind | Motivate yourself with Ariarne Titmus
programme.desc: The power of self-talk and music is all Australia’s swimming sensation, Ariarne Titmus, needs to motivate herself to get her going in her quest to reach the top.

programme.title: Sarah Sjostrom, Sweden’s Swimming Superstar | Splash In
programme.desc: When Sarah slipped and broke her elbow a few months before Tokyo 2020, her fans thought she may not even compete at the Olympics. She fought back, accelerated the recovery, and ended up winning silver in the 50 free. She currently holds 5 World Records and is eyeing Paris 2024 to add new achievements. Soundtrack: Mabel, Let Them Know

programme.title: Nikoloz: The judo World Champion from two nations | The Starting Line
programme.desc: When Nikoloz Sherazadishvili’s family moved him from Georgia to Spain at a young age, his father instilled a love of judo in him. He quickly felt at home at the local club of Brunete, in the outskirt of Madrid, where everything started with his first coach Quino Ruiz. As he gears up for his second Olympics, surrounded by his family and friends, he’s competing on the mat for Spain but also holding Georgia and the memory of his father close to his heart.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Tom Daley: 1.6 Seconds | Documentary
programme.desc: This feature documentary dives into the life of the UK’s diving legend. From Beijing 2008 to his gold medal in Tokyo 2020 and final Olympics in Paris 2024, Daley shares his personal journey, the pressures, losses, and triumphs that defined his career. Exclusive footage and candid moments reveal a story of resilience and growth.

programme.title: Women's Cross-Country | Cycling Mountain Bike | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Women's Cross-Country Final at Elancourt Hill, Paris, on 28/07/24. Pauline Ferrand Prevot (FRA) claimed the Gold, Haley Batten (USA) the Silver and Jenny Rissveds (SWE) the Bronze.

programme.title: Matteo Zurloni Italy’s world champion climbs to the top | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: Dive into the remarkable journey of Matteo Zurloni, from small town dreamer to Olympic contender. He won the speed event at the 2023 IFSC Climbing World Championships and earning a shot at Olympic glory. Follow his ascent from humble beginnings to the dizzying heights of international competition, where every climb is a test of skill, courage, and the relentless pursuit of excellence.

programme.title: Men's Gold Medal Match FRA - FIJ | Rugby Sevens | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match between France and Fiji took place on 27/07/2024, at the Stade de France. France took the Gold with a Final Score FRA 28:7 FIJ.

programme.title: Jerry Tuwai: bringing hope from the slum to the nation
programme.desc: Jerry Tuwai grew up in a poor shanty in Fiji playing rugby with plastic bottles. He went on to win the first Olympic medal for his country.

programme.title: Men's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Lukas Maertens (GER) claimed Gold with a time of 3:41.78, Elijah Winnington (AUS) took Silver and Kim Woomin (KOR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 400m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 400m Freestyle Race was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Ariarne Titmus (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 3:57.49. Summer McIntosh (CAN) took Silver and Katie Ledecky (USA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's's 4x100m Freestyle relay Final was held on 27/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with a time of 3:28.92, The United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Nuffin for Nuffin | Documentary
programme.desc: Forty-five years after their first and only Olympic medal, Bermuda's hopes of glory now rest on the shoulders of a new generation of boxers. See how these young boxers overcome adversity and struggle beyond the ropes to keep this tiny island nation's Olympic dreams alive.

programme.title: Dressage Individual Grand Prix Freestyle | Equestrian | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Dressage Individual Grand Prix Freestyle took place at the Chateau de Versailles, France, on 04/08/2024. Jessica von Bredow-Werndl (GER) won the Gold with a total score of 90.093. Isabell Werth (GER) won the Silver, and Charlotte Fry (GBR) won the Bronze.
